title: INTEGRATION_run_agent test fails only when running all test cases together

content.raw:
Running INTEGRATION_run_agent test fails when running all test cases together. Strangely, running each test separately using 
```
#!c++ 
--gtest_filter
```
does work. When running the second and third tests, the client fails to be added into the world even though a successful init message has been sent. I suspect that when RCPserver is shutting down, it is not doing clean up correctly.
